accountSecurity.title: Account Security
accountSecurity.description: If you create an account, you are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and password. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.description: You agree to use our services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms.
acceptableUse.prohibitedBehaviors: When using this website, you agree not to engage in the following behaviors:
prohibitedList: Violate any applicable laws, regulations, or these terms of service
Spread false, misleading, or harmful health information
Impersonate others or misrepresent your identity or affiliation
Upload or transmit viruses, malware, or other harmful code
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems or other users' accounts
Use our services for commercial purposes without authorization
Harass, abuse, or harm other users
Collect or harvest personal information from other users
